description: a uniqe code for study species, see species-info.csv for details
light treatment: "fs" for full sun and "s" for 50% shade
sample is either used for destructive measurement for harvesting above ground biomass or used for burning, so "h" is for harvest and "b" is for burning
there are 3 replications for each sample of each treatment, use number 1-3 for replication
leaf area mearsured by scanning the leaf and analyzing the image with imageJ
